description: GlobalKTable Metrics derived from Kafka Streams JMX metrics

panels.title: Max CPU Core Usage

panels.description: The total number of records dropped for all tasks.
panels.title: Total Dropped Records

panels.description: Max Consumer Lag of all selected instances
panels.title: Max Consumer Lag

panels.description: Fraction of time the I/O thread spent actively doing I/O
panels.title: CPU IO Ratio

panels.description: Fraction of time the I/O thread spent waiting for I/O
panels.title: CPU IO Wait Ratio

panels.description: The number of CPU cores is this process using, on average, over the last 5 minutes.
panels.title: CPU Core Usage

panels.description: Memory used in percentage of max
panels.title: Memory Used (%)

panels.description: Max (bytes) of a given JVM memory area
panels.title: Max Memory

panels.description: Memory used bytes for heap and nonheap
panels.title: Memory Used Bytes

panels.description: Number of clients with state = RUNNING
panels.title: Number of Running Clients

panels.description: The average number of bytes per second this Kafka consumer is reading from Kafka topics.
panels.title: Bytes in Per Sec

panels.description: The max lag of the partition
panels.title: Max Consumer Lag

panels.description: The average number of records per second processed
panels.title: Records Processed per Sec

panels.description: The total number of dropped records
panels.title: Dropped Records Total

panels.description: The average number of bytes fetched per request
panels.title: Bytes Fetched per Request

panels.description: The number of fetch requests per second.
panels.title: Number of Fetch Requests per Sec

panels.description: The average throttle time in ms
panels.title: Throttle Time

panels.description: The average time taken for a fetch request.
panels.title: Fetch Latency Avg
